realtimeweb.businesssearch.main

Interface Location

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CoordinateLocation, DetailedLocation, NamedLocation, RectangularLocation

    public interface Location
    An interface representing a Location. The different locations possible are listed below, from least specific to most.
    • NamedLocation - Represented by a single string (e.g. "Blacksburg, VA")
    • CoordinateLocation - Represented by a single lat/long (e.g. 42, 45)
    • RectangularLocation - Represented by a pair of lat/longs (e.g. 42, 45 to 33, 37)
    • DetailedLocation - Represented by a coordinate and a postal address
    Author:
    acbart

        Returns:
        A mapping between Yelp arguments and the values of the location.
